message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I've priced it at $2,000,000 to reflect its worth. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a budget. Can we meet in the middle at $1,200,000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your initial offer. Let's meet closer to the middle ground - how about $1,700,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $1,700,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,400,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at $1,400,000?
